content: Big Food is being disrupted for sure. In some cases it’s running up against government regulation that has no basis in science. I am seeing really cutting edge studies on gut bacteria, and fermented food. Gut bacteria and raw dairy. Yet, if you produce foods like this you are tossed in jail and your assets are seized. Big Food is on the cusp of something really really big as food innovation uses the tailwind of modern science to go from niche to movement, to mainstream.
